name: Suffering of the Pumpking
description:
Suffering of the Pumpking was made for the 72h  Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin

The Game is an unfair Plattformer but it becomes easier after 100 Deaths.

Everything beside the Musik was made by my self during the game jam.

Musik was made by Denevir ( https://soundcloud.com/donevir )  during the game jam.

P.S.

I am really sorry!
